title: PUBG unit sales worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.
The Unit sales in millions is highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
There is a difference of 48.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month May 2017.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unit sales in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.
The Unit sales in millions is highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
There is a difference of 48.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month May 2017.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
The difference of Unit sales in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 48.0.
The Month June 2018 has the highest Unit sales in millions, followed by September 2017, and August 2017. Down to the Month May 2017 which is the lowest.
The Unit sales in millions has decreased over the past 5 Months.
The average Unit sales in millions in all 5 Months is 14.8.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 74.0.
